name: Oddsmaker
description:
Oddsmaker is a turn-based RPG where you play as four children on a quest to restore the balance of power in the state of Iowa after a cataclysmic event all but wiped out the last remnants of modern civilization, at the request of an old crow named Clyde. 

Fight an army of unique enemies in order to get stronger, and find out who’s been siphoning all the resources for themselves.

Song used in the trailer: Everlasting Spirit from Yakuza Kiwami
